result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven Lee Moon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
May be served under the Huber Law as long as the defendant reports and remains alcohol and controlled substance free.
Concurrent with: any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Steven Lee Moon, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Guy M. Taylor.
Gary L. Luhman appeared as prosecuting attorney.   Court advises defendant of rights.  Plea Questionaire filed  Elements stated  Factual basis found. DA Luhman reads plea agreement into record. Court orders 30 days jail with credit for 1 day credit. Court waives court cost in this matter.

Steven Lee Moon, defendant appeared in Court in custody with counsel Guy M. Taylor.
Gary L. Luhman appeared as prosecuting attorney.

Violation: Obstructing an officer
Issuing agency: MPD
  Must notify District Attorney, Clerk of Court's Office and own Attorney of any address or employer  change within 48 hours.

Steven Lee Moon, defendant appeared in Court in person with counsel Guy M. Taylor.
Jeffrey Duane Kohl appeared as prosecuting attorney.  Court advises defendant of rights.  Defendant given complaint.  Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.  Defendant advised of right to Attorney  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Defendant stands mute, Court enters not guilty plea on defendants behalf.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
